name: The Alchemist (itch) (DallOner)
description:
A Ludum Dare (#48) entry

DISCLAIMER

<<< State of the Game: a rough Prototype, only with MVP gameplay >>>

The Alchemist, a casual puzzle game.

"Law of Equivalent Exchange: Something cannot be created from nothing, and so in order to obtain something, something else of equal value must be lost."

Main Objective of the game??? Simply just create The Philosophers’ stone with a perfect transmutation (easy peasy!). 

Pro Tip: Always remember the Law of Equivalent Exchange!

Controls: Just Click the Orbs to make transmutations. 

Air(gray orb) > Earth(green orb) > Water(blue orb) > Fire(red orb) > Air
